saturdayEvents.title: Participant Check-In
saturdayEvents.description: Check in to a weekend of fun, learning, teamwork, and most importantly, free food!

saturdayEvents.title: Opening Ceremony
saturdayEvents.description: Join the HackRPI team to open the Hackathon to our Hackers, Sponsors, and Judges!
saturdayEvents.speaker: HackRPI Team

saturdayEvents.title: Coding Starts!
saturdayEvents.description: Ready! Set! Code! Start working on your projects!

saturdayEvents.title: Boba from Taichi
saturdayEvents.description: Enjoy some free boba from one of our collaborators, Taichi!

saturdayEvents.title: Intro to Tech Stack Workshop
saturdayEvents.description: Learn everything you need to know about Git, Open Source Licensing, and the t3 tech stack to be able to build an amazing hackathon project!
saturdayEvents.speaker: Wes Turner, Jackson Baimel

saturdayEvents.title: Accenture Fireside Chat
saturdayEvents.description: Accenture is a global professional services company specializing in digital, cloud, and artificial intelligence. With expertise across more than 40 industries, Accenture helps clients use technology and strategy to drive transformation and innovation. Join them to learn more about their work and global impact.
saturdayEvents.speaker: Subba Ramaswamy, Steven Gelis

saturdayEvents.title: Mercer XLab Open Hours
saturdayEvents.description: Come check out the Mercer XLab on the 6th floor of the JEC, and gain access to computers, lab stations, and other equipment for hardware projects!

saturdayEvents.title: Quantum Computer Tour
saturdayEvents.description: Join the Quantum Computing Club to tour RPI's state-of-the-art quantum computer!
saturdayEvents.speaker: RPI Quantum Club

saturdayEvents.title: Agile Development Workshop
saturdayEvents.description: Join John Sturman for a presentation about agile development and how to work in a development group for maximum productivity. We will explore Scrum and iterative development doing a fun simulation exercise to give you some hands-on experience. This is a good workshop to support you in working in a group creating a project efficiently and effectively.
saturdayEvents.speaker: John Sturman

saturdayEvents.title: HackRPIsec Workshop
saturdayEvents.description: Join RPISEC for a hands-on look at game hacking through the ages. This workshop will showcase techniques used to explore and modify both retro and modern games, with walkthroughs and live demonstrations.
saturdayEvents.speaker: Connor Czincila

saturdayEvents.title: Quantum Computer Tour
saturdayEvents.description: Join the Quantum Computing Club to tour RPI's state-of-the-art quantum computer!
saturdayEvents.speaker: RPI Quantum Club

saturdayEvents.title: Hacking with GitHub Copilot Workshop
saturdayEvents.description: Learn to use GitHub Copilot, your ultimate AI sidekick: an AI-powered pair programmer that supercharges your ability to write, debug, and explain code like never before. MLH will demonstrate Copilot's one-click MCP capabilities by using the GitHub and MLH MCP servers to instantly create an interactive, up-to-date, customized GitHub profile README page! This workshop is beginner-friendly (if you asked, 'what's MCP?' this is the place for you), and there will be a giveaway for some exclusive swag!
saturdayEvents.speaker: Emily from MLH

saturdayEvents.title: Intro to Google AI Studio Workshop
saturdayEvents.description: In this beginner-friendly workshop, MLH will speedrun through a whole range of some of the incredible AI features offered by Google AI Studio that you can use at HackRPI or anywhere! Google AI Studio is the fastest way to start building with the Gemini family of multimodal generative AI models. From grabbing an API key in seconds, to live-streaming audio/video to Gemini, to building out a raffle wheel-spinner for some cool freebies, you won't want to miss this! And yes, we did say 'cool freebie raffle' :)
saturdayEvents.speaker: Emily from MLH

saturdayEvents.title: Making AI Agents Workshop with RPai
saturdayEvents.description: In this workshop, RPai will cover what AI agents are, examples seen in the industry, and how to construct one in code. Additionally, they will present on how to leverage Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers to create a uniform interface for AI agents and applications to interact with. This workshop is beneficial for those wanting to build agents to automate tasks in their day-to-day lives or projects!
saturdayEvents.speaker: Na'sir Miller, Aashrut Jain

saturdayEvents.title: Forge Sticker Workshop
saturdayEvents.description: The Forge will be open to anyone interested in designing and creating their own contour-cut vinyl stickers. They will be holding a workshop on using free design software, and afterward, they will help you print your designs for free! Bringing a laptop and a few images you want to turn into stickers is strongly recommended to be able to follow along and participate.
saturdayEvents.speaker: Nate Mirin

saturdayEvents.title: Code Golf
saturdayEvents.description: Code Golf challenges participants to solve programming problems using the fewest possible characters. Compete to showcase your coding efficiency and creativity in a race to create the shortest, cleverest solutions!
saturdayEvents.speaker: Matt Treanor

saturdayEvents.title: Ugliest Code Compeititon
saturdayEvents.description: Show off your messiest, most chaotic code in the Ugliest Code Competition, where the least readable, most convoluted solutions win! Embrace bad habits and unleash your inner code gremlin for the ultimate anti-aesthetic challenge!
saturdayEvents.speaker: Matt Treanor

saturdayEvents.title: Mentoring with Girls Who Code
saturdayEvents.description: The Mentoring Desk is here to support you throughout HackRPI! Get guidance, troubleshoot problems, and ask questions at any stage of your project — our mentors are ready to help you bring your ideas to life.
saturdayEvents.speaker: Girls Who Code RPI

saturdayEvents.title: Mentoring with ACM-W
saturdayEvents.description: The Mentoring Desk is here to support you throughout HackRPI! Get guidance, troubleshoot problems, and ask questions at any stage of your project — our mentors are ready to help you bring your ideas to life.
saturdayEvents.speaker: ACM-W RPI

saturdayEvents.title: General Mentoring
saturdayEvents.description: The Mentoring Desk is here to support you throughout HackRPI! Get guidance, troubleshoot problems, and ask questions at any stage of your project — our mentors are ready to help you bring your ideas to life.

saturdayEvents.title: Sleeping Rooms
saturdayEvents.description: Need a break? Take a nap in our Sleeping Rooms!

saturdayEvents.title: Velan Studios Fireside Chat
saturdayEvents.description: Velan Studios, based in Troy, New York, develops original video games that combine creative gameplay with new forms of technology. Their projects include Knockout City and Hot Wheels: Rift Rally. Stop by to learn more about their approach to game development.
saturdayEvents.speaker: Guha Bala

saturdayEvents.title: GlobalFoundries Fireside Chat
saturdayEvents.description: GlobalFoundries is one of the world's leading semiconductor manufacturers, delivering essential chips that power devices across industries—from smartphones to cars to data centers. Learn how GlobalFoundries drives innovation in chip design and fabrication right here in upstate New York.
saturdayEvents.speaker: Alex Martin, Tara McCaughey

sundayEvents.title: Sleeping Rooms
sundayEvents.description: Need a break? Take a nap in our Sleeping Rooms!

sundayEvents.title: Last Chance Mentoring
sundayEvents.description: The Mentoring Desk is here to support you throughout HackRPI! Get guidance, troubleshoot problems, and ask questions at any stage of your project — our mentors are ready to help you bring your ideas to life.

sundayEvents.title: Devpost Submissions Due @ 9 AM
sundayEvents.description: You must create a Devpost submission before 9 AM Sunday. You can edit your submission and project until coding ends at 11.

sundayEvents.title: Coding Ends
sundayEvents.description: Hands off the keyboard! No work on your project should occur until after the event ends!

sundayEvents.title: Science Fair Presentation Block 1
sundayEvents.description: Get ready to demo and explain your projects to a panel of industry professionals, professors, and fellow students! See the Discord announcement for information on your block and table!

sundayEvents.title: Science Fair Presentation Block 2
sundayEvents.description: Get ready to demo and explain your projects to a panel of industry professionals, professors, and fellow students! See the Discord announcement for information on your block and table!

sundayEvents.title: Closing Ceremony
sundayEvents.description: Join us in announcing the winners, and celebrating a great event!
sundayEvents.speaker: HackRPI Team
